mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CCOMMENT(BNO, CWRITER, CCONTENT, CREGDATE, CNO) VALUES(#{bno}, #{cwriter}, #{ccontent}, SYSDATE, CCOMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, CWRITER, CCONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREGDATE, CNO FROM CCOMMENT WHERE BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY CREGDATE DESC
